Button.name: $(parent)CPProfileGreen
Button.OnMouseUp: if upInside and button == 2 then CSPS.openTreeToSection(4, 1) end

Button.name: $(parent)CPProfileRed
Button.OnMouseUp: if upInside and button == 2 then CSPS.openTreeToSection(4, 3) end

Button.name: $(parent)CPProfileBlue
Button.OnMouseUp: if upInside and button == 2 then CSPS.openTreeToSection(4, 2) end

Texture.name: $(parent)OutfitProfiles
Texture.OnMouseUp: self:SetTextureCoords(-0.03,1.03,-0.03,1.03) if upInside then self:SetAlpha(1) if button==1 then CSPS.showSubProfileDiscipline(7) elseif button==2 then CSPS.openTreeToSection(9) end end self.moDo = nil
Texture.OnMouseEnter: if not self.moDo then self:SetAlpha(1) end ZO_Tooltips_ShowTextTooltip(self, RIGHT, string.format("%s\n|t26:26:esoui/art/miscellaneous/icon_lmb.dds|t: %s\n|t26:26:esoui/art/miscellaneous/icon_rmb.dds|t: %s", GetCollectibleCategoryNameByCategoryId(13), GetString(CSPS_SubProfiles_Edit), GetString(SI_GIFT_INVENTORY_VIEW_KEYBIND)))

Texture.name: $(parent)QuickslotProfiles
Texture.OnMouseUp: self:SetTextureCoords(-0.03,1.03,-0.03,1.03) if upInside then self:SetAlpha(1) if button==1 then CSPS.showSubProfileDiscipline(4) elseif button==2 then CSPS.openTreeToSection(8) end end self.moDo = nil
Texture.OnMouseEnter: if not self.moDo then self:SetAlpha(1) end ZO_Tooltips_ShowTextTooltip(self, RIGHT, string.format("%s\n|t26:26:esoui/art/miscellaneous/icon_lmb.dds|t: %s\n|t26:26:esoui/art/miscellaneous/icon_rmb.dds|t: %s", GetString(SI_COLLECTIONS_BOOK_QUICKSLOT_KEYBIND), GetString(CSPS_SubProfiles_Edit), GetString(SI_GIFT_INVENTORY_VIEW_KEYBIND)))

Texture.name: $(parent)GearProfiles
Texture.OnMouseUp: self:SetTextureCoords(0,1,0,1) if upInside then self:SetAlpha(1) if button == 1 then CSPS.showSubProfileDiscipline(6) elseif button == 2 then CSPS.openTreeToSection(7) end end self.moDo = nil
Texture.OnMouseEnter: if not self.moDo then self:SetAlpha(1) end ZO_Tooltips_ShowTextTooltip(self, RIGHT, string.format("%s\n|t26:26:esoui/art/miscellaneous/icon_lmb.dds|t: %s\n|t26:26:esoui/art/miscellaneous/icon_rmb.dds|t: %s", GetString(SI_ARMORY_EQUIPMENT_LABEL), GetString(CSPS_SubProfiles_Edit), GetString(SI_GIFT_INVENTORY_VIEW_KEYBIND)))

Texture.name: $(parent)SkillProfiles
Texture.OnMouseUp: self:SetTextureCoords(0.1,0.9,0.1,0.9) if upInside then self:SetAlpha(1) if button==1 then CSPS.showSubProfileDiscipline(5) elseif button==2 then CSPS.openTreeToSection(3) end end self.moDo = nil
Texture.OnMouseEnter: if not self.moDo then self:SetAlpha(1) end ZO_Tooltips_ShowTextTooltip(self, RIGHT, string.format("%s\n|t26:26:esoui/art/miscellaneous/icon_lmb.dds|t: %s\n|t26:26:esoui/art/miscellaneous/icon_rmb.dds|t: %s", GetString(SI_CHARACTER_MENU_SKILLS), GetString(CSPS_SubProfiles_Edit), GetString(SI_GIFT_INVENTORY_VIEW_KEYBIND)))

Texture.name: $(parent)CPCheck2
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.toggleCP(2) end

Texture.name: $(parent)CPCheck3
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.toggleCP(3) end

Texture.name: $(parent)CPCheck1
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.toggleCP(1) end

Label.name: $(parent)AccCharLabel
Label.OnMouseUp: if upInside and button == 1 then CSPS.setBarManagerAccountMode() end

Texture.name: $(parent)Include4
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.barManagerSetCP(self, 4) end

Texture.name: $(parent)Include5
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.barManagerSetCP(self, 5) end

Texture.name: $(parent)Include3
Texture.OnMouseUp: if upInside == true then CSPS.barManagerSetCP(self, 3) end

Button.name: $(parent)BtnImp1
Button.OnMouseUp: if upInside then CSPS.importLink(ctrl, shift, alt, button) end
